name: Emma Departed
description:
Semi autobiographical vent game made on Bitsy about your best friend/unrequited love abandoning you. Most items/events mentioned are real. Emma, if you see this (though I doubt you will), happy Valentine's Day. I miss you. This was made in like... an hour, sorry if it seems rushed or if the story isn't exactly fluid. I didn't plan on making this game.

Features:
+ non-gender specific
+ a variety of cats
+ mild (censored) cursing
+ a few (easy) puzzle elements
